      • applySubstitution

        Term applySubstitution(Substitution tau)
        Constructs a new term from the application of the given substitution to this term. Need for substitutions composition.
        Parameters:
        tau - the substitution
        Returns:
        the new term if the substitution modify the term this if the substitution has no effects.

      • applySubstitution

        Term applySubstitution(Substitution tau,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Variable> vars,
                     long time)
        Constructs a new term from the application of the given substitution to this term. (Note: apply ' to distinguish variables with equals name (and different index) example: in case of x_3 and x_4 --> x_newIndex and x'_newIndex
        Parameters:
        tau - substitution
        vars - map of variables and new name given in the results
        time - index of the new clause
        Returns:
        the new term if the substitution modify the term this if the substitution has no effects.

      • applySubstitution

        Term applySubstitution(Variable var,
                     Term ter)
        Constructs a new term from the application of the given substitution to this term. (Replace the given variable with the given term) Need for substitutions for update the terms to assign when a new entry in Substitution is added.
        Parameters:
        var - variable
        ter - term to assign
        Returns:
        the new term if the substitution modify the term this if the substitution has no effects.
